data.name: Arcane Barrier
data.desc: Each time a face-up Spellcaster monster(s) on the field is destroyed, place 1 Spell Counter on this card (max. 4). You can send this card and 1 face-up Spellcaster monster you control to the GY; draw 1 card for each Spell Counter that was on this card.

card_sets.set_name: Speed Duel: Attack from the Deep
Structure Deck: Order of the Spellcasters
